Translations.Text: Arau smarana karaa e'i kitabata mara'iyamaka, yetiya te'om nija paraiyalabargara paraa prthaka hai pura disara eta nirjana sthanata asraya nile
tara pichata te'om sihamtara paraa nijake parda karaile. Tetiya ami te'omra ocarata amara rauha (jibraila)ka praerana karailo, te'om te'omra ocarata purna manaraakrtita atmaprakasa karaile
Mara'iyame ka’le, ‘ma'i tomara paraa rahamanara asraya praarthana karaicho, (allahaka bhaya karaa) yadi tumi muttakbi horaa’
Te'om ka’le, ‘ma'ito tomara pratipalakara duta, tomaka ejana paraitra putra dana karaara babe ahicho’
Mara'iyame ka’le, ‘mora putra kenekai ha’ba yihetu moka kono purause sparsa karaa na'i arau ma'i byabhicaraini'o nahaya’

Te'om ka’le, ‘e'idarae'i ha’ba’. Tomara pratipalake kaiche, ‘e'ito mora babe sahaja; arau ami te'omka e'i babe srsti karaima yate te'om manuhara babe eta nidarsana haya arau amara phalara paraa eta anugraha; e'ito eta sid'dhantakrta bisaya’
Tara pichata mara'iyame te'omka garbha dharana karaile arau se'i garbhasaha durararti edokhara tha'ilai guci ga’la

tara pichata prasara-bedana'i te'omka ejopa khejura gachara talata asraya nibalai badhya karaile. Te'om ka’le, ‘haya, iyara agate'i yadi ma'i mrtyubarana karailohemtena arau manuhara smrtira paraa sampurnaraupe heraa'i ga’lohemtena!’
Tetiya talara paraa te'om mara'iyamaka mati ka’le, ‘tumi cinta nakaraiba, tomara padadesata tomara pratipalake eta nijaraa srsti karaiche
arau tumi khejura gachara kanda dharai jokarai diya, i tomara oparata taja paka khejura pelaba

Eteke khoraa, pana karaa arau caku jura peloraa. Yadi kono manuhara lagata tomara dekha haya tente ka’ba, ‘ma'i rahamanara uddesye maunata aralambanara manata karaicho. Seye ma'i aji karao lagata katha naka'om’
Tara pichata te'om kemcuraatika lai nija sampradayara ocarata upasthita ha’la, sihamte ka’le, ‘he mara'iyama! Arasye tumi eta adbhuta bisaya lai ahicha’
‘He haraunara bhagni! Tomara pitr kintu asat byakti nachila arau tomara matr'o byabhicaraini nachila’
Tetiya mara'iyame kemcuraatira prati ingita karaile. Sihamte ka’le, ‘dolanata thaka eti kemcuraara lagata ami kenekai katha patima’
kemcuraatorae mata lagale, ‘niscaya ma'i ejana allahara banda. Teraemi moka kitaba pradana karaiche arau moka nabi bana'iche
‘ma'i ya’te'i nathako kiya te'om moka barakatamaya karaiche, arau yimana dina jiraita thakima teraemi moka chalata arau yakata adaya karaibalai nirdesa diche
‘arau moka mora matrra prati anugata karaiche arau te'om moka ahankarai, abadhya karaa na'i
‘Arau mora prati santi yidina ma'i janma labha karaicho, yidina mora mrtyu ha’ba arau yidina ma'i jiraita arasthata ut'thita hama’
E'omrae'i haiche mara'iyamara putra icha. (Yito barnana karaa ha’la) e'itorae satya katha, yi bisaye sihamte sandeha posana karaiche
Santana grahana karaa allahara kama nahaya. Te'om paraitra mahimamaya. Te'om yetiya kiba karaibalai sthira karae, tetiya kerala e'i buli kaya ‘ha’ se'ito tatksanata hai yaya
Niscaya allahe'i mora raba arau tomalokarao raba; seye tomaloke te'omra ibadata karaa, e'itorae'i sarala patha
Tathapi'o dalasamuhe nijara majate matanaikya srsti karaile, seye mahadirasa pratyaksakalata kaphirasakalara babe dhbansa anibarya
Sihamte yidina amara ocarata upasthita ha’ba sidina sihamta kimana ye spastakai suna paba arau dekha paba! Kintu yalimasakala aji spasta bibhraantita ache
Arau sihamtaka paraitapara dina samparke satarka karai diya, yetiya sakalo sid'dhanta hai yaba. Athaca sihamta udasinatata bibhora hai ache arau sihamta imana posana nakarae
Niscaya prthirai arau iyara oparata yi ache se'i sakaloborara curanta malikana kerala amarae'i thakiba arau amara ocarate'i sihamta pratyarartita ha’ba
